r1001.Name: Harbor Road West
r1001.Desc: A cobblestone street leading east and west. You can hear the market to the west.

r1002.Name: Harbor Road East
r1002.Desc: A cobblestone street leading east and west. You can hear the harbor to the east.

r1003.Name: Harbor Square
r1003.Desc: A busy cobblestone square, full of sailors and cargo. Cries of seagulls and the scent of salt fill the air.

r1004.Name: Market Road North
r1004.Desc: A cobblestone street leading north and south. You can hear the market to the south.

r1005.Name: Herb Shop
r1005.Desc: A cozy little shop filled with bundles of drying herbs and things in jars.

r1006.Name: Smithy
r1006.Desc: A warm, loud, and smoky blacksmith shop.
